comment: She seems like a wonderful mother. If she doesnt want them around her I am sure there are genuine reasons and we dont need to know them.

                  :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91

                  :ARG1-of (w / wonderful-03)))
      :snt2 (s3 / sure-02
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / reason
                        :mod (g / genuine))
                  :op2 (n / need-01
                        :polarity -

                              :ARG1 r))
                  :condition (w3 / want-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 (s4 / she)
                        :ARG1 (b / be-located-at-91

                              :ARG2 (a2 / around
                                    :op1 s4))))))

comment: Well....unless she thinks the kids arent safe around the woman, its a bit weird that the gf cant be around them. I mean what if Ben wants to take the kids and gf on holiday or hes celebrating his bday or something?

                                    :ARG2 (g / girlfriend)))
                        :ARG2 (a / around
                              :op1 (k / kid))))
            :degree (b2 / bit)

                  :ARG0 (s / she)
                  :ARG1 (s2 / safe-01

                        :ARG2 (a2 / around
                              :op1 (w2 / woman)))))
      :snt2 (m2 / mean-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (a3 / amr-choice
